Package camzup.core

Class SvgParser

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.SvgParser
public abstract class SvgParser
extends java.lang.Object
A very basic scalable vector graphics (SVG) parser class. SVG parsing is at best very minimal and incomplete. Use only for basic or simplified SVG files, not ones that contain CSS styling (color and materials will not be evaluated anyways).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SvgParser.PathCommand
    Command found in a path node's d attribute.

    • parseCssRgba

      public static Color parseCssRgba​(java.lang.String str, Color target)
      Attempts to parse a string representing a Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) representation of an RGBA color. The input string is expected to be in one of the formats:
      • "rgb(255, 127, 54)"
      • "rgb(100%, 50%, 25%)"
      • "rgba(255, 127, 54, 0.125)"
      • "rgba(100%, 50%, 25%, 0.125)"
      The default color is (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0).
      Parameters:
      str - the string
      target - the output color
      Returns:
      the color

    • parseEllipse

    • parseFloat

      public static float parseFloat​(java.lang.String v)
      A helper function to parse units of measurement in an SVG element. The default value if the string cannot be parsed is zero.
      Parameters:
      v - the value
      Returns:
      the floating point number

    • parseFloat

      public static float parseFloat​(java.lang.String v, float def)
      A helper function to parse units of measurement in an SVG element. Uses the following conversions:
      • 1 centimeter (cm) = 37.79499816894531f units
      • 1 inch (in) = 96.0f units
      • 1 millimeter (mm) = 3.7795000076293945f units
      • 1 pica (pc) = 16.0f units
      • 1 point (pt) = 1.3333332538604736f units
      • 1 pixel (px) = 1.0f units
      View box relative units, namely % is limited; all this parser will do is divide the value by 100.

      Font-relative units, namely em and ex are not supported.

      For polar coordinates, radians are assumed to be the default. Degrees (deg) are converted to radians through multiplication by 0.01745329238474369f.
      Parameters:
      v - the String value
      def - the default value
      Returns:
      the parsed float

    • parseLine

      public static Curve2 parseLine​(org.w3c.dom.Node lineNode, Curve2 target)
      Parses a SVG node and returns a Curve2 forming a line.
      Parameters:

      target - the output curve
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the output curve entity
